FILETIME=[546ADE80:01C7935D] 
 
 
Dear Sir/Madam,  
 
A Whois inquiry listed your name as the host of this site, which is
infringing on our copyright. INGRIDZ.NET 
 
 I hereby confirm that I am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of
the copyright for http://www.habbohotel.com.  
 
The owner of this copyright is Sulake NA Ltd. www.habbohotel.com is an
online graphical chat and gaming environment for teenagers. The site
takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is represented by an
avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in all of the
hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by the
Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users
purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such
as credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines
and cheques.  
 
Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus: 'All rights
including trademarks, copyright and database rights in this website and
its contents are owned by or licensed to Sulake NA Ltd. All rights are
reserved.' Our copyright is registered and protected by United States
Federal Law (17 U.S.C. Section 512(g)(3) including The Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998) while also within the European Union,
Japan, the People's Republic of China and various other jurisdictions.  
 
The material in which is deemed illegal and illicit can be found at
INGRIDZ.NET, which is considered a pirated copy of the source of our
client itself. 
 
I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this website
is not authorised by Sulake NA Ltd, the copyright owner, or the law. 
 
I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that
I am authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this
under penalty of perjury. I am thus writing to you to request that this
site is removed from your servers forthwith.  
 
Please inform me when this has been effected.  
Yours sincerely,  
Barbara Steinberg  
Community Safety Assistant Manager Sulake Corporation
